feature.name: Artificer Specialist: Luthier Artificer (HB)
feature.text:
Known by many to be the combination of harmony and dissonance, paired with magic and science, luthier artificers craft instruments for themselves that pulse with reverberating force that vibrates nearby creatures and objects to their very core. They use these powerful instruments to embolden their allies, distract their enemies, and invoke magic.
Source: Tasha's Scrapped Book p. 5 (Homebrew)

feature.name: Luthier Spells (Luthier Artificer (HB))
feature.text:
You always have certain spells prepared after you reach particular levels in this class, as shown in the Luthier Spells table. These spells count as artificer spells for you, but they don't count against the number of artificer spells you prepare.
Luthier Spells: Artificer Level | Spells 3rd | dissonant whispers, thunderwave 5th | enthrall, shatter 9th | mass healing word, counterspell 13th | confusion, compulsion 17th | synaptic static, destructive wave
Source: Tasha's Scrapped Book p. 5 (Homebrew)

feature.name: Bonus Proficiencies (Luthier Artificer (HB))
feature.text:
You gain proficiency with woodcarver's tools. If you already have this tool proficiency, you gain proficiency with one other type of artisan's tools of your choice.
Source: Tasha's Scrapped Book p. 5 (Homebrew)

feature.name: Arcane Instrument (Luthier Artificer (HB))
feature.text:
You can use your woodcarver's tools and 10 gp worth of materials to create a stringed instrument of your choosing as part of a long rest. This is your Arcane Instrument. As a bonus action you can play a tune on your Arcane Instrument that distracts a foe. Choose one creature within 60 feet, that creature takes 1d6 Thunder damage and has disadvantage on their next attack roll. If that creature must make a Constitution saving throw to maintain concentration on a spell, you can subtract 1d6 from the result.
Source: Tasha's Scrapped Book p. 6 (Homebrew)

feature.name: Instrumental Skill (Luthier Artificer (HB))
feature.text:
Whenever you deal thunder or psychic damage, you can add your Intelligence modifier to the damage roll. Additionally, as a bonus action, you may use your Arcane Instrument to give a creature within 60 feet of you that can hear you advantage on their next Wisdom save against being Charmed or Frightened.
Source: Tasha's Scrapped Book p. 6 (Homebrew)

feature.name: Flash of Musical Genius (Luthier Artificer (HB))
feature.text:
When you use your Flash of Genius feature, you may add a d10 to the roll in addition to your Intelligence modifier.
Source: Tasha's Scrapped Book p. 6 (Homebrew)

feature.name: Enhanced Arcane Instrument (Luthier Artificer (HB))
feature.text:
While holding your Arcane Instrument, you can increase or decrease the radius of a spell you cast that deals thunder or psychic damage by 5 feet, and you can roll two additional damage dice when determining the damage the targets take.
Source: Tasha's Scrapped Book p. 6 (Homebrew)
